title: Hear their Heartbeat
overview: 12-years old Besna he encounter three man. This was the beginning of his story full of destruction.

title: The Clean Sneak
overview: Detective Clinton Miles is on a case, searching for evidence to solve the killing of Daniel Parker.

title: See You Next Weekend
overview: Seeking one final crack at adolescent glory, Bloom Beesly and his friends walk into what they hope to be the party of the century. What they find is a corpse, a gun, and a very dangerous white bag.

title: Wacht nacht
overview: Nothing is what it seems during this brief meeting in an empty night shop. When Claire has to carry out a silly assignment from her sorority, Hafid is standing behind the counter. The serious looking Amsterdam guy seems to give her a taste of her own medicine. The question soon arises who is manipulating who. One thing is certain: after those few minutes when the lives of these completely different people intersect, everything will be forever different.

title: The Noir-Cissist
overview: Detective Pierce Sheppard is the best there is, or so he thinks. He's determined to live his film-noir fantasy and solve a grisly murder, but he can't seem to keep his thoughts to himself.
tagline: You can bet your sweet ass he's a detective!

title: Armed & Deadly: Gangs UK
overview: In every city in the UK, there's an underbelly of violence and disorder. There's a breed, now, that will shoot you, go home, and play Xbox. As night falls, organised crime groups wage war to control the drugs trade, protect their turf, and carry out revenge. But what is it like being part of this criminal world? Some of the UK's most notorious and violent criminals reveal the truth about gangster life.

title: Deep Return
overview: In the dead of night, a pair of grave robbers search for valuable jewelry.
tagline: Two incompetent robbers make a grave mistake.

title: Scumbags
overview: Marco and Vincent, a con artist and a jewel thief respectively are somewhere between friends and backstabbing criminals. They meet up at their old stomping grounds to get drunk, reminisce, and talk up their latest misdeeds. Friendly competition evolves into a fatal confrontation, as truths come out and guns are drawn.

title: Rhys Jones: The Clues That Caught the Killer
overview: Documentary examining the investigation into the murder of 11-year-old Rhys Jones in Liverpool. Detectives involved in one of the most notorious cases of recent times recall how Sean Mercer was convicted for Rhys's murder, despite little evidence and an unwillingness among witnesses to talk.

title: GO TO SLEEP
overview: Alex struggles to take pay bills as she takes care of her dying brother. A doctor visits and gives her upsetting news that leaves her with a hard decision to make.

title: The Rapture: In the Radure
overview: Detective Conad awakens from a terrible dream, but will soon discover the mysterious artist known as "The Rapture" is much more than a fruit of his imagination!
tagline: What did you see under the mask?

overview: Carles, Pau and Dante meet at the funeral of their friend Tolo. They soon discover that a mysterious briefcase is related to their friend's death. Violence, lies and bizarre situations revolve around this briefcase and the protagonists of "408".

title: The Lair
overview: Athens. The last day of a female member of an illegal terrorist organization. Despina shoots, kills, wanders around the city, tries to find help, fails in every attempt, gets shot, dies in her apartment. The movie attempts a personal portrait of the city of Athens through the drifting of the main character. The Lair - a low budget production with DIY aesthetics and queer elements - is an existential road movie.

title: EXT.NUIT
overview: ONE TAKE, A CAR AND A HOLE

title: Silence of God
overview: Alberto is a journalist who dedicated his carreer to investigate organized crime, but now his only aim is different: to find Ana.

title: Sara Stein - Old Friends
overview: Missing human rights activist Dori Meyer's severed hand is found on a Tel Aviv beach. Sara and Blok investigate.

title: Durj
overview: The story of a woman searching for her missing husband that had been killed for hunger by the kidnapper.

title: Murrder: Locke and Loaded
overview: When a ruthless drug lord has sinister plans to take over the world, it is up to two detectives (Canyon DiMare and Quincy Barham) both with tragic past to come together and save the world.

title: Slenderman Killings: Beyond Evil
overview: Journalist Vick Hope investigates the disturbing rise in online horror stories and characters like the Slender Man, which are striking fear into people around the world, and how the increasingly blurred line between online fantasy and reality could inspire even more violence in the future.

title: Criminalising Women
overview: Why are more women in Australia going to prison than ever before? Women find themselves behind bars for various crimes ranging from violence in self-defense to drug trafficking, breaking-and-entering & driving under the influence. Many then get stuck in a pattern of re-offending and repeated jail stints. ‘Criminalising Women’ follows three Australian ladies who have been released from prison. The feature traces their rehabilitation into society, and how they navigate an institutional system that is designed to punish them, instead of bringing about a change in individuals.

title: Chasing Oscar
overview: Mr. Carbone hires a team of men on a mission to search and rescue a briefcase. Although when the men find out what's in the briefcase, the tables turn.

title: Safe Escape
overview: A robber tries to evade the police with his recently stolen safe.

title: Los Oceana
overview: A get rich quick job with the mafia turns ugly for three guys after they get set up.

title: Hunter
overview: Serial killer "Drill" only murders women. Shiro Tsubaki investigates the series of murders, but so far without success. In addition, Tsubaki is not only a very unorthodox investigator, but also a traumatized man. Then there is a trail, but it runs in the sand and there is another victim ...

title: State of Fear: Murder and Memory on Black Wall Street
overview: Tulsa, Oklahoma is renowned as "the oil capitol of the world" - once home to the most prosperous black community in the United States known as "Black Wall Street." In 1921, after members of the KKK had effectively taken control of the city, Black Wall Street was destroyed in a massacre known as "The Tulsa Race Riot." Black Wall Street, formerly known as the Greenwood District was then renamed the Brady District for Tulsa's Ku Klux Klan-affiliated Mayor. Ever since, the area has known extensive, community-wide victimization by racist members of the Tulsa law enforcement community. In April 2015, a Reserve Deputy killed Eric Harris, an unarmed suspect, as he ran from members of the Tulsa County Sheriff's Office.

title: Milza Man
overview: Tony is a Sicilian man whose job is to prepare bread with spleen. He undergoes a genetic mutation after being buried by a load of rubbish and his super-power consists in hitting the enemies with slices of spleen.

title: Ceremony night
overview: An hour before a funfair is opened, a worker falls to his death down the big wheel, and the other workers are forced to keep silent and continue the opening ceremony.

title: The Last Conversation
overview: When returning home, a man runs into an unexpected guest with deadly intentions.

title: Abate
overview: Isabel, a young woman from Rio, receives the news that her grandfather Ismael's farm, her place of affection during childhood, was sold by her parents without her knowledge. Driven by her veiled memories, she picks up her mother's car at dawn and drives to the farm in an attempt to repair the past.

title: Lilits
overview: A story fragmented in three parts: Marina an ordinary girl, Marie a transsexual girl and Maxine a New Age style hippie girl. All three immerse themselves in a unique job, which is led by Stefano, a mysterious man who creates thematic, the girls they must smoke opium and sleep. After a while, Maxine discovers a sordid plan of old traditions and where the only thing that remains is to escape before they are eliminated.

title: Codes Abided
overview: A group of outlaws are being tailed by crooked cops. A man in each group wants to turn cheek, but sometimes the law of the crew overrules internal desire.

title: Enganche
overview: A man must come to terms with his violent background in the eve of his child's birth.

title: Damned Gold
overview: Khuder must navigate the worlds of organized crime and the supernatural after escaping from a mental institution.

title: Victims
overview: The film tells a short story about two unsuccessful couriers who, it would seem, are given a simple task — to transport a small load. What could go wrong?

title: Washout
overview: Following a botched job, a Hitman attempts to come to terms with the loss of his family, his friends.......his sanity?

title: Bad Henry
overview: The complete story of Henry Louis Wallace and the panic he unleashed in the city of Charlotte has never been told on television before," says Henry Schleiff Group President of Investigation Discovery, Travel Channel, Destination America and American Heroes Channel. "'Bad Henry' showcases the fearless tenacity of Garry McFadden and his team in their efforts to capture this killer, providing justice, and most importantly, closure to the victims and their families

title: Honor
overview: A story of three people who got their second chance in life through a person's heroic action.

title: Troll-A-Long with a Rent-A-Cop: A Thug Life Tour Guide to the Reno City Zoo
overview: Agent Beacon went undercover as a security officer to investigate organized crime in a small Nevada town, where an informant, and a murder cover-up, further yields the discovery of a multi-state drug trafficking operation from Mexico and into the U.S.
tagline: In a Place Where the American Dream is the American Nightmare.

production_companies.name: Shaanxi Youlian Guangshi Culture Communication Co.

title: Mirrors
overview: A well-functioning criminal scheme for theft and sale of mirrors fails when one of the thieves kills the car owner who has caught him. All the city's police forces are dispatched to capture the gang. But the main witness to the crime turns out to be familiar with the murderer and plunges herself into painful doubts, without betraying him. The girl is unaware that the other witness to the murder is the leader of the "Mirrors" gang.

title: Migraine
overview: A man decides to help out the mob, hoping for a reward.

title: Cube
overview: Landis arrives at the meeting site

title: Details
overview: Ukraine... Kyiv... 2017... summer... "March of Equality"... Time for change. But are we ready? Several hours from the life of the ordinary teacher who committed a crime. The excitements and thoughts of the person who committed two fatal and horrible crimes by the yardsticks of society. Which and why? The answer is in the details.

title: A Brush Soaked in Carmine
overview: A documentary exploring both the events and the personalities involved in a tragic incident that resulted in the death of a young man and the imprisonment of the artist who killed him.

title: Monopoly
overview: Four men plan to execute a heist.

title: Killing Video
overview: Mrs. Zhou, a sanitation worker, has found a mini DV camcorder with broken screen by the riverside.This short film is a video from the Camcorder, which recorded the death of the owner.

title: Puppet Family: The Fridge!
overview: Johnny is hungry so he goes to the fridge to get something to eat.

title: Puppet Family: The Juice Heist!
overview: Tyrone runs out of juice, so he goes out to find some!

title: Fred & Rose West: 5 Clues That Caught the Killer
overview: The infamous crimes of Fred and Rose West, who carried out a series of murders at their home on Cromwell Street, Gloucester between 1967 and 1987. Deputy senior investigating officer Terry Moore reveals the details of the police work that resulted in their arrests and ultimately the conviction of Rose West, with Fred committing suicide while on remand in 1995.

title: Content Guidelines
overview: A YouTube prank goes terribly wrong and now they have to get rid of dead body so their channel doesn't get deleted

title: Lucky Luke
overview: A ruthless killer for hire waits for a client to show him the body of his wife he paid to be murdered. A peek into the mind of a contemporary assassin whose lack of morality is obnoxious.

title: Brain Stew
overview: After years of working a dead-end job he hates, Clyde Barrow is desperate for a way out -- any way out. His call is soon answered by Jaco Kleinman, who suggests they commit a crime so awful that they're ran out of town forever.
tagline: Their minds were set on overdrive!

title: Impotencia
overview: Mario, a windshield cleaner boy, is accused of stealing Fabiola's money; its  his mother. This causes her to take her son's money from her friend Enrique from her; another cleans  for breezes. Mario tries to get his friend's money back by confronting his stepfather; from  who suspects theft. Faced with his failure, he decides to steal a cell phone and during the tour of  his escape is hit by a car. Enrique's mother died in the hospital during  she waits for Mario and Fabiola receives the news that her son has died in an accident.

title: Blood of My Brother
overview: After years of running the drug game in his city, King catches a 4 year federal bid. After he's released, he realized the players of in the game have changed. Broke and down on his luck he tries to reclaim his spot as king of the streets. But his greed will cost him his brother's life and have him on the wrong side of a Haitian cartel.

title: Raghu CNG
overview: A story is about one psychopath human who is Raghu Himself. Raghu is the single handed character who draw the story.

title: we stol a chark
overview: a dream. a family. a heist. a chark
tagline: When was the last time you saw the moon?

title: Southside: June
overview: A down on her happiness and slightly sociopathic calendar girl decides to rob a wealthy businessman who just came into town.

title: The Bag
overview: Going home lonely woman finds the corpse on the lane. The man was strangled by the plastic bag. And this is not the first murder in the city. Who is this maniac and who is his next victim? Major Gunko and Junior Lieutenant Petrushka are going to investigate this series of murders.

title: CafeKa
overview: A. has received a new murder order after years, arranges to meet the case in a cafe called “Cafe Ka”…

title: Card Scene
overview: This time they're playing for their lives.

title: RUA
overview: The dark side of the streets are portrayed in this story, that follows Mike's life in the space of a few days.

title: Kriminal!
overview: A compilation of Giallo trailers

title: Whack Job
overview: Tensions rise when a sadistic mob boss discovers the true identity of one of his enforcers.

title: Karman
overview: Karman follows a worn out dealer, a disenchanted boy, a sleepless girl and a saint through an addicted city.

title: Sad Silent Movie
overview: Three BIFOLCHI drive on the highway, a motorcyclist overtakes them.
tagline: NOOOOO YOU CAN'T PUT IT ONLINE IT'S NOT A REAL MOVIE NOOOOO

title: Pighead
overview: A 19-year-old vagabond, passing through one of many rural slums on his way to nowhere, decides to steal from a service station in order to make ends meet. However, we discover his motivation rests on something much more personal.

title: Suitcase Without a Handle
overview: Two thugs, each with a secret agenda to escape their life of crime once and for all, are tasked with picking up a briefcase at a near-border cafe.

title: Black Crisis
overview: Hao Zhenguo, deputy prosecutor of Tianxiang City, was ordered to investigate the explosion of the Hushan coal mine. It was found that Qiu Chengde, chairman of the mining group, colluded with Bo Wenjiang, director of the safety supervision, Meng Yunlu, director of the homeland administration, and Qin Mu, director of the city administration. The regulations on production safety management use the opportunity of state-owned enterprise restructuring to aggressively embezzle state-owned resources, conceal the truth of the mine disaster, and waste lives. The task force was not afraid of power, and wrestled with corrupt interest groups, and finally made the victims of the grievances clear, and the corrupt elements received the due legal punishment.

production_companies.name: Film Center of the Supreme People's Procuratorate

title: The Thin Orange Line
overview: A detective out for revenge is interrupted by his childhood imaginary friend.

title: First Snow
overview: Scandalous ruinous article is about to be published by a journalist. Main protagonist Anuar and his gang are hired to kill the journalist. The night ours story takes place Anuar witnesses a family scene between the journalist and his son, morally torn Anuar has to make a difficult choice whether to commit a murder on a person who has a son and a wife, just like him.

title: HOP
overview: Brock and Sid used to be pretty good contract killers. Now they're less-good gentleman thieves.

title: No Weapons
overview: Novelist follows an adolescent who makes the wrong decisions in the streets of London.

title: The Feds
overview: Two FBI Agents go through the troubles of working together on a case to take down a smuggler that possess technology that has never been seen before.
tagline: Two FBI Agents deal with the troubles of working together to stop a smuggler that possesses advanced technology.

title: Midnight Animal
overview: Short fan film based of the game Hotline Miami

title: GRIND
overview: GRIND features the story of Robert Wilmote, a Liberian refugee forced to flee the most drastic and terrible circumstances imaginable. Having narrowly escaped the war, Robert’s struggles continue in the U.S. when he succumbs to the gangster life, becoming a convicted felon in Newark, New Jersey. Yet, Robert realized he was meant for greater good. Through dramatic reenactments, featuring Robert himself, we discover how Robert’s passion for fitness and helping others empowered him to become a champion.

title: Grbavica
overview: A ball spins around, stuck in the river that goes through the Grbavica neighborhood in Sarajevo.

title: Vena Amoris
overview: Natalia after a long relationship, decides to break up with her husband and tell him the whole truth.

title: The Revenge of Phantom Knight
overview: A patriotic doctor returns to his homeland with his family, seeking a long missing treasure. A series of weird things keeps happening and the doctor begins to behave oddly. Meanwhile, a madman is murdering the local citizens and the doctor’s wife starts to have suspicions. Right before she is able to uncover the truth, another larger conspiracy quietly comes along.

title: The Mountain Kings
overview: Set in the Appalachian Mountains three inmates Eddie, Zack and Spazz break out of prison in an attempt for a better life. What happens when the three inmates no longer need one another and complications arise. Will the three men turn their backs on one another and claim every man for themselves or will they adhere to the constitutes of brotherhood.

title: Wieselflink & Brandtgefährlich - Das große Geschäft
overview: Canapés, champagne, fireworks... and a dead body! Richard Kühn, managing director of a luxury toilet seat company, is murdered during a party - in a quiet little place of all places. The investigators are thrown headlong into the case on their night off...

title: Wieselflink & Brandtgefährlich - Zwei Gesichter
overview: Preparations for the "100 years of Lünen police station" anniversary celebration are in full swing, an event set to conclude with a tribute to outstanding investigative work. An honor the team surrounding Brandt and Wiesel might be worthy of considering their latest case: bar owner Robin Bürger has been found dead in his cooling chamber. The investigation proves to be increasingly complicated as everyone affiliated with it either tries to hide the truth or plot against one another. Soon, Brandt and Wiesel are certain that all of them are two-faced. How right they are with that assumption and how deeply the case will come to affect their own lives are the questions at the heart of this 5th "wieselflink and brandtgefährlich" film.

title: Wendigo Montana
overview: Wendigo Montana follows hero Colt as he tries to solve the serial murders of prostitutes in a small Montana community.
